title: Experience and Expertise
content: Onix has a team of experienced Salesforce developers who are well-versed in the latest Salesforce technologies and best practices. They have a track record of successfully delivering custom Salesforce apps to clients across various industries.

title: End-to-End Solutions
content: Onix offers end-to-end solutions for Salesforce application development, from ideation to implementation, testing, and maintenance. They work closely with clients to understand their unique business needs and develop customized solutions that drive results.

title: Agile Development Methodology
content: Onix follows an agile development methodology emphasizing collaboration, flexibility, and continuous improvement. This approach enables them to deliver high-quality Salesforce apps quickly and efficiently while allowing for changes and adjustments along the way.

title: Salesforce Partnership
content: Onix is a Salesforce consulting partner, which means they can access the latest Salesforce tools, resources, and support. Salesforce also recognizes them for their expertise and commitment to delivering innovative solutions that help clients achieve their goals.

title: Openness and Transparency
content: No bureaucracy and hidden procedures. All you need to do is to sign an NDA and contract to start working with our team. Moreover, our specialists clearly report the work, including highly detailed invoices with the hours spent on each task.

title: Increased Flexibility
content: Onix offshore team can work flexible hours, allowing you to manage your project across multiple time zones without sacrificing quality or speed.
